snippet.title: GTA LC01 Lore #2: Bike Ban
snippet.description:
This is just one slice of a new series that will showcase our expanded universe's lore and keep fans entertained as we finish development.

All clips feature real gameplay from within the Liberty City 2001 Total Conversion mod for Grand Theft Auto 3.
Certain effects and audio have been dramatized for cinematic effect.

Created by Luigi's Club, honouring Rockstar's classic.

Implementation of motorbikes and BMXes is owed to _AG, of ClassicAxis fame and many more, done for LC01.

https://gtaforums.com/topic/983493-grand-theft-auto-liberty-city-01/?do=findComment&comment=1072451040

Trailer credits
Editing: DoctorMike
Footage: Matt1010 & Claudiu Florea
Writing: Sergiu C.
